description: This file contains code that demonstrates the use of the Agent class with different models, fetching an audio file, and printing various token metrics related to audio, reasoning, and cached tokens. It appears to be a script for testing or demonstrating features of the agent system related to special token metrics.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an AI agent capable of processing and responding to prompts, with support for different models and media.

classes.name: Audio
classes.description: A class representing audio media content.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A class representing an OpenAI chat model configuration.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to print the agent's response to a prompt, optionally with audio content.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Method to execute the agent with a given prompt.
